dt: {bc}enjoying or characterized by well-being and contentment
{bc}having or marked by an atmosphere of good fellowship {bc}{sx|friendly||}
{bc}impulsively or obsessively quick to use or do something
{bc}enthusiastic about something to the point of obsession {bc}{sx|obsessed||}

pt: {sc}lucky{/sc} {sc}fortunate{/sc} {sc}happy{/sc} {sc}providential{/sc} mean meeting with unforeseen success. {sc}lucky{/sc} stresses the agency of chance in bringing about a favorable result.
{sc}fortunate{/sc} suggests being rewarded beyond one's deserts.
{sc}happy{/sc} combines the implications of {sc}lucky{/sc} and {sc}fortunate{/sc} with stress on being blessed.
{sc}providential{/sc} more definitely implies the help or intervention of a higher power.

{sc}fit{/sc} {sc}suitable{/sc} {sc}meet{/sc} {sc}proper{/sc} {sc}appropriate{/sc} {sc}fitting{/sc} {sc}apt{/sc} {sc}happy{/sc}{sc}felicitous{/sc} mean right with respect to some end, need, use, or circumstance. {sc}fit{/sc} stresses adaptability and sometimes special readiness for use or action.
{sc}suitable{/sc} implies an answering to requirements or demands.
{sc}proper{/sc} suggests a suitability through essential nature or accordance with custom.
{sc}fitting{/sc} implies harmony of mood or tone.
{sc}apt{/sc} connotes a fitness marked by nicety and discrimination.
{sc}happy{/sc} suggests what is effectively or successfully appropriate.
{sc}felicitous{/sc} suggests an aptness that is opportune, telling, or graceful.

shortdef: favored by luck or fortune : fortunate
notably fitting, effective, or well adapted : felicitous
enjoying or characterized by well-being and contentment

dt.t: I {it}couldn't be happier{/it} with the way our new kitchen looks.
